XML.STR: It has some rust here and there. Once used, it's sure to be difficult to sell.
It's a rusty sword. Once used, it's sure to be difficult to sell.

An old metal ring. It is worn out and doesn't seem to have much value.
A silver coin used in the past. You can no longer use this coin for currency, but it has value as an antique.
A gold coin used in past. You can no longer use this coin for currency, but it has value as an antique.
Neatly crafted topaz. It is something that a jeweler would surely desire.
A bright-red ruby that almost reminds one of the color of blood. It is quite antique, but it can receive a high price because it hasn't lost its glow.
A big diamond. Needless to say, it is very difficult to find.
A platinum necklace with expensive jewels. Its elaborate carving enhances its value even more.
A dagger designed by a legendary swordsman.
An obscure dagger handed down from the Moon dynasty.
This strange dagger raises defensive strength.
An unsually shaped ring sword that only the first class swordsmen of the ancient kingdom could handle. The sound of it piercing the wind makes their own army tremble with fear.
A dagger so sharp that those who wield it believe it can cut through shadows. The dagger's weight is nearly finite, the lightest of its kind.
A rare dagger that generates its own heat. Due to its unique ability, it is very popular in the colder regions. The dagger as a weapon is not very strong, but it is known for its shamanistic powers.
A golden ceremonial dagger. This dagger is not much of a weapon, but it has a mysterious effect.
A unique sword designed by a legendary swordsman.
An obscure sword handed down from the Moon dynasty.
A light wooden sword suitable for beginners practicing swordsmanship.
A gruesome looking iron hammer. It is powerful, but slow, heavy and hard to handle.
A sword that assumedly used for ancient traditional ceremonies. The blade is not made of iron but some mystery metal and despite for its old age, the blade hasn't lost its sharpness.
Golden Dragon Dual Sword, used by the highest officers, designed to intimidate enemies of the Empire. (Designed by Bak4Maru from NA GunZ)

A sword made of mystical black iron only found at the mountain areas of southern mainland. The unique refinery technique of black iron made the thunder bird shape on the sword. (Designed by jin_sd from KR GunZ)
Ultimate weapon that can flush anything. It strikes both mind and body.
Ultimate weapon that can flush anything. It strikes both mind and body.
The sword that has the soul of a legendary guitarist of Astra. The sound from the hilt drives people wild and even a slight touch of the blade can be deadly. (Designed by ROOT from JAPAN GunZ)

An odd shaped katana made from the bones of the black dragon. The Black Dragon Sword is difficult to manage and requires much strength to control, maybe due to the dragon’s grudge; however, once controlled its power is astonishing.
A powerful and epic saw-blade sword that reigns destruction upon anyone in its path. Its only defect is its heavy weight.
A Knight's Sword of the Axium Empire made with an extremely light alloy. This sword represents justice, tradition, and with its sturdy guard handle allows for defensive agility.
A great sword made by the royal craftsmen of the Empire. The sword is custom made only for Knights of the Empire, making the sword extremely rare.
An ultralight ax that can be lightly handled liked a sword. It has been praised for satisfying both power and usability.
(Dual Wield) These pistols are mainly used by novice adventurers.
(Dual Wield) These strange pistols raise AP for the person who wears it.
(Dual Wield) These are pistols that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
(Dual Wield) Pistols used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
This reconstructed gun has the same rapid-fire speed of a pistol as well as the strong firepower of a revolver. Its big size and recoil make it hard to control, but its firepower is indisputable.
The Axium Empire knights' pistol. This weapon was widely regarded as a symbol of justice. The spread wings that grace the barrel are said to protect the shooter while shooting.
The future of dual-pistol technology is upon us. The Time Induced Shot (TIS) pistol appeared from the underworld through unknown sources.
(Dual Wield) Revolvers that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
(Dual Wield) Revolvers used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
(Dual Wield) The most powerful revolvers of their class. Developed mainly focusing on firepower. It is difficult for beginners to use it due to it's slow firing rate and strong recoil.
A pair of revolver which use Magnum bullets to enhance the fire power. In order to reduce the recoil and increase the continuous shooting power, the size of the gun is augmented to raise the weight.
A powerful pistol created by a famous gunsmith from the Midwest part of Astra. (Designed by Müller Pereira from Brazil GunZ)
A weapon that shoots arrows using the catapult. It is remodeled to improve the revolver's control ability.
(Dual Wield) SMGs mainly used by novice adventurers. It seems that merchants remodel the Renard's Magazine illegally and then sell them on the black market.
(Dual Wield) SMGs that the Republic's soldiers used to use.
(Dual Wield) SMGs used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
An industrial tool reformed for military use. It has strong damage but slow consecutive shot speed.
Latest SMG developed by Adam Industry. The gun’s muzzle is split to implement overwhelming fire power. Due to insufficient supply, this weapon is currently extremely rare.
Shotgun that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
Shotgun used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
A unknown foreign country developed this shotgun. It looks a little too light as a weapon, but the gun has great capability which comes from its light weight.
A shotgun with enhanced power from the Breaker series. Fire rate and stability are relatively decreased, thus making it hard to control this gun.
The gun's inner structure is remarkably altered for faster continuous shooting and high bullet charge. Such attempt has named the weapon as 'Pioneer.'
Updated version of an old model which was once quite popular. It has extreme destructive power, but is rather difficult to control.
[Rare] Limited Edition of remodeled “Arquebus”. The ammunition capacity for one clip has increased, but is rather difficult to control.
A new and unique shotgun with a powerful spray. This new model allows for an extremely large clip. The only drawback is its weight.
A common shotgun for new adventurers. By renovating the Breaker's magazine, the maximum number of bullets that it can carry has been increased.
The trial model of Adam Industry’s new firearms development business. Its performance is not yet sufficient, but it is surprisingly light.
A great shotgun made with the delicate touch of royal craftsmen. This industrial-era shotgun is highly exquisite and shows better performance than the newest model.
Rifle that the Republic's soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
Rifle used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani.
A rifle focused on fire rate and stability. Its stable and controllable recoil makes it an excellent choice to use.
The test model which has been developed secretly at Walcom Company. In order to reduce the weight and increase the bullet charge, the newest high technology is introduced to the weapon.
Machine Gun used in Iron Crow, the center of the Havani, main city for outlaws.
The latest machine gun model by Adam Heavy Industry. The gun is easy to use and possesses heavy fire power with fully automatic shooting. Its only defect is its heavy weight.
A machine gun used by Republic soldiers. They put their base names on their guns.
A rocket the Republic soldiers used to use. It was named after their residence.
A rocket produced for the Iron Crow. Used to dominate Havani, city of outlaws.
A more balanced rocket launcher. Its damage is somewhat sacrificed but the clip capacity and the reload speed have been improved.
A latest model weapon identified to be created confidentially at Harvani, the city of outlaws. (Designed by Ryo ^1Shintenzu/Shikamaru ^0from NA GunZ)
A rocket launcher in the shape of Jaws, the shark. Its performance is dreadfully powerful.
Latest model of the Breaker 9 series, made by Rionix. No major changes in ability, but the level restriction got lowered.
A stray rocket launcher that can carry more rockets than a normal rocket launcher. It is lighter and does less damage.
Rocket Launcher with the new Optimite warhead. The weight of the warhead is low, which increases the maximum number of missiles fired.
Military combat hat designed by Ares.
Ceremonial dress hat designed by Icon for the Ranks of the Empire to wear at political ceremonies.
Exclusive soft hat for the Gunners Heaven crew, it matches a dark colored coat.
Basic military head bandana for combat.
Practical lightweight bandana with a water drop pattern.
Soft star glazed pattern bandana for men.
This unique hat was designed for the Eternal Blue outlaw crew.
Lightweight hat recommended for novice adventurers who hate outfits with heavy equipment.
Keep the sun out of your eyes with this cool hat.
Iron Crow warriors wear these protective hats around the city of Havani, the city of outlaws.
A Christmas season Santa Cap for men.
Heavy bandana designed for the Phantom Breed spy crew.
Men's hat for a secret organization associated with religious groups.
Men's hat for the Empire's elite troops.
Men's Sir Protector Hat, designed for protection.
This loud and stylish hat was designed for the Bigi crew members.
Men's Warrior Hat used in combat, enhances defensive strength.
Desert Flame hat originally designed for troops that were stationed in desert areas.
Specially designed men's helmet made from all reinforced material. This headgear protects against all types of damage.
(Limited-time offer) Men's sportswear suitable for any type of sport. It seems to make you powerful. [Red]
(Limited-time offer) Men's sportswear suitable for any type of sport. It seems to make you powerful. [Yellow]

Military officer hat used by war fanatics.
A classic leather hat for men.
Stylishly designed lightweight hair band for men. Poor defensive enhancement, but good health bonus.
Men's Blue Vane hat made of highly flexible material.
Men's hat worn by soldiers guarding the trains going through the empire and the republic. It has the advantage of being lightweight.
Men's hat worn by the personal assistants of the empire's nobles.
Men's hat worn by those in the Republic support forces, Healing Hands.
Men's bunny ears head band that can be used as an extra accessory.
Men's cat ears head band that can be used as an extra accessory.
Men's sports hat that is comfortable enough to wear everyday while still maintaining sports functionality.
A sporty visor that works well against harmful sunlight.
Male student's hat at Empire's prestigious high school for the children of noble households.

Headband for men, used by people who have grown resistance against cold for living in northern territory, far from the mainland, where it is severely cold winter through out the year. (Designed by Azume from NHN GunZ)

Headgear for men, used by Brotherhood gang members who have gained immense wealth in enormous speed by using people's faith for god to expand the influential territory. (Designed by Xlll from NHN GunZ)
A helmet which can only be worn once in twelve years.
A familiar hat with a stylish picture that looks as if seen somewhere else before.
A festival wig that will enhance your festive mood.
Valkyrie Headset for the adventurers who are active even during harsh winter. It is flexible enough for outdoor activity and keeps warmth. (Designed by Valkyrie† from Brazil GunZ)
Hat worn by those who worship Scrider, the demented god of destruction.
Icarus Hat worn by the airplane pilots from Ares who fly across the Astra continent.
Hat worn by people who reside in the southern island. This hat is cute and unique to its geographical location.

Highly customized mask worn by the Xian Tactical Assassin Unit (XTA). Their unit is recognized for their high moral conviction and swift execution of a “higher law”, earning them the title: “The Shadows of Justice”. (Designed by Ryo Shintenzu/Shikamaru from NA GunZ)
Kung fu wig that carries the soul of a legendary Kung fu fighter which makes one feel like a Kung fu master.
Heavy Metal Hat for free souls who enjoy traveling wherever.
A hair ornament for the chosen one who has received the supreme call from the divine being. (Designed by Nhu Tu/ Wing Age from NA GunZ)
A formal hat worn by the young men of noble families in Axium Empire.
A tuxedo wig for a wedding that has a sharp and elegant touch.
A uniform hat worn by the navy army soldiers of the Republic of Travia.
A traditional head band of the Yohawk clan who have fought vigorously against the merge with the Republic during the foundation of the Republic of Travia.
A felted hat worn by the disciples of Ramitz during the renaissance of forgotten magic flourished by Ramitz.
Devil's Horns worn by the young lads to celebrate the Independence Day of the Empire.
A hat worn by the Police officers who ensure the safety of the republic of Travia.

Men's "Fenrir" special forces combat uniform, who's job is to guard the President of Travia. A solid and top quality made helmet with priority given to high defensive power for the protection of the wearer.
A white winter hat that is great for a snowy day. (Men)
A reindeer hair band for a snowy winter day. Increases EXP earned by 20%
A hat of Sun Rang, a private group of the sons of nobility who devote their training to a healthy mind and body.
Man’s wig for the formal meeting of the Axium hitmen, who are the best assassins of underworld for never missing the target and leaving no trace.
Men’s wig for Travia Cryinghawks, a mercenary clan. The members of this clan value honor and social justice, and are admired by other mercenaries.
Men’s wig for Axium Soulreaper, the cleric of Republican church who absorbs possessed souls and cures the sick patients.
Men's formal wig for the high-class Soulreapers who have been elevated by curing the souls of one thousand people.
A fan’s wishful hat for the victory of the game. (Men)
The official wig for the preachers of the Travia church, who are determined to make justice a reality by spreading the word of God and punishing heathens.
A tricorne of the Empire navy’s worst enemy, the Shark Teeth, who had power over the Astra ocean. They have made the people of sea tremble with fear with their ferociousness and cruelty.
A hat worn by the cowboys, who pioneered the barren and untapped territory of the western continent of Astra.
A skull mask with a smile on it, which tempts people to wear it.
A man’s wig for the assassin members of Rebel Agent, who are mysterious even to the Empire Information Division.
A man’s wig for members of the Black Dragon Clan, an alliance of merchants and hunters who have risen to fight against the tyranny of the corrupt Establishment.
A mask for the Tactical Ninja, a special combat group that has been secretly working for the Republic for Travia from a remote location.

Diving goggles of the Deep Blue SEAL, a special forces group for the Republic of Travia who perform their duties deep under water.
Adorable Rabbit mask. It is rather heavy due to its large size but it is good for protection.
Casual hair for the hipsters of the Hunter Alliance. It provides excellent defense but is suprisingly heavy.
A beanie worn by the members of the Travia Republic’s famous gang, the Travian Heathen Underground.

아네라몬이 소환해온 궁극의 마물. 하늘에 부유하여 거대한 날개를 휘젓고 돌아다닌다. 슈페리온에게 수세에 몰린 아네라몬이 최후에 소환해버린 마물.
